title: Facebook expects to add 10,000 workers in product and engineering this year, says COO Sheryl Sandberg
text: "Our hiring is keeping at a very, very aggressive clip," Sandberg said. The pledge comes as the country braces for a massive spike in unemployment.

title: Facebook launches fact-checking service on WhatsApp in Italy to fight coronavirus hoaxes
text: Facebook Inc. launched a service in Italy to check the accuracy of information on coronavirus circulating on its messaging platform WhatsApp, the U.S.
